Package org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.browser

Interface Summary
ChronoscopeClickListener Called whent he user clicks on a menu item
SafariKeyboardConstants Misc class to hold keycode constants used by Safari
 

Class Summary
BrowserCanvas An implementation of Canvas that creates a CANVAS tag per Layer, as well as using DIVs and images to render text on the CANVAS
BrowserCanvasPattern An implementation of CanvasPattern using Javascript CANVAS
BrowserChronoscopeMenu An implementation of ChronoscopeMenu using GWT PopupPanel and MenuBar/Menuitem
BrowserChronoscopeMenuFactory A menu factory which creates GWT Menus
BrowserLayer An implementation of the Layer interface using the Safari/WHATWG Javascript CANVAS
BrowserLinearGradient An implementation of the LinearGradient interface on the JavaScript CANVAS
BrowserRadialGradient An implementation of RadialGradient on the Javascript CANVAS
BrowserView A realization of a View on the browser using Safari JavaScript CANVAS and DOM Level 2 CSS
BrowserXYDataSourceFactory Uses SCRIPT tag for cross domain, and XMLHttpRequest for same domain
ChartPanel ChartPanel is a GWT Widget that intercepts events and translates them to the Chart interface as well as creating a View instance for the chart to render with.
Chronoscope Factory class and JS API interface for Chronoscope Charts

This class exports methods that can be used by both Java and JS to create and configure charts, as well as being a global sink for History events
CssGssContext Implements a GssContext by injecting hidden DOM elements for each GssElement,pseudoElement pair that is queried.
CssGssProperties Implementation of GssProperties with values taken from DOM Level 2 CSS
CssGssPropertiesIE Placeholder for IE support.
CssGssPropertiesOpera Opera9's DOM level 2 CSS has many implementation differences compared to Firefox/WebKit, this class is just for testing right now
CssGssPropertiesSafari Fixes a bug in Safari2
DomTextLayer A class that implements text rendering by positioning DIVs with text or images over the canvas.
DomTextLayer.TextLayer  
FontRendererServiceAsyncJson Class to deal with cross-domain RPC
JavascriptHelper The class that everyone reimplements (until GWT 1.5 :) )
Microformats Helper class used to parse microformat annotations in the DOM and turn those into charts.
ScriptTagXYDataSource  
XMLHttpRequestXYDataSource
